website_summaries.verdict: These slippers are like walking on a cloud but are solid enough to wear out of the house.
pros: Plush lining feels heavenly and keeps your feet comfortably warm
Snug fit loosens as you wear the slippers

customer_reviews.title: Still the Same Cute Mocs.......
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with the classic Ugg look; I will wear and enjoy these shoes. Sad that younger people will not enjoy the quality lining that the original Uggs had--the switch to Ugg "purewool" is a big disappointment (it seems to be a blend of polyester and something else). Further displeased that the Seller lists several countries the lining might be produced in (only one is Australia) and actually did not include the Phillipines (clearly listed inside my mocs as the place the lining was produced). So.....if you want a pretty comfortable, cute moccasin, this shoe is still for you. I will miss the luxurious comfort of the past!
customer_reviews.author: Disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Watch those ankles; Narrow soles
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these on Prime Wardrobe and glad I did. I wear a 7.5 so I ordered an 8. First off someone with a box cutter cut through the leather on the side of the slipper that I received- not good quality control. The 8 was too big but instead of getting a 7 I just returned them because the sole- although made of rubber which is why I felt spending $100 on these slippers would be worth it- the sole in my opinion is crafted too narrow. One wrong twist and I felt like I would break an ankle. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Angelique

customer_reviews.title: It comes in narrow!
customer_reviews.text: It is warm, cozy, stands up to trips in the back yard. Acts like a shoe, but more like a warm slipper. Very good fit for me as I ordered a narrow , which is hard to find in any footwear. Might be a smidge too large for other wearers, but great for me. Only negative is that the fluff wears down and moves around a bit - bunches up around the toes. Maybe there is a way to fluff it up again but have not researched yet. Also, I sprayed a scotchguard inside and out, just for protection from moisture and soils.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customeri

customer_reviews.title: Fake but comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These uggs are faker than fake. HOWEVER they’re super comfortable and I’m low maintenance so I’m not about to go through the hassle of returning them. Hopefully they hold up over time. Definitely order a size up if you’re a half size. I’m 7.5 and got an 8, fits a little snug but the nice kind of snug.
customer_reviews.author: cameron soffes

customer_reviews.title: My first UGG purchase and very happy
customer_reviews.text: I adore these slippers. I had to cut the string that secures the knot and untie them so that I could ease the fit. This means that the rawhide laces sometimes have to be retied, but I don't mind. The soft feel of the sheepskin fleece keeps my feet warm and dry - no sweaty feet. Eventually I know the lining will wear out so I'll need new ones, but as of this writing I'm going on 17 months of daily wear and love them as much as I did the first day.
customer_reviews.author: CPV

customer_reviews.title: FAKE UGGS - BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: These are not real Uggs. The description says they are, but that is not what was shipped to me. There is no registered trademark symbol on the sole, on the side or the inside. I'm returning these.
customer_reviews.author: Laurbabe

customer_reviews.title: Love but a little small
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 7 in Ugg, but with the Dakotas I needed to go uoba size. They are tight when you first get them, until you break it in, but it was just too small and I needed to size up. They’re very warm and cozy! I do recommend also getting the Ugg cleaning and protection kit to keep these in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Foster

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfy and REAL
customer_reviews.text: They are real Uggs just to clarify any dispute. Secondly, regarding size, my daughter is a 7.5 and thanks to the reviews, we went with the 8 and it is perfect! The plush is plush so if you are between sizes, go up. She loves them and finds them to be extraordinarily comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Bear

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in a size 8 for my mom who is a size 7 1/2, and she couldn't get them on her feet.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Slippers
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of Ugg slippers and I will never go back to the other brands. They are super comfortable and the wool does not overheat my feet like the cheap slippers do. I'm a size 7 1/2 and ordered the 8s. Perfect fit. The wool really shaped to my feet.
customer_reviews.author: MMWegg

customer_reviews.title: Very warm and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Slippers were a little tight at first but after a few wears, fit to foot. The fluffy lining gets compacted.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Large and narrow
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this slipper. However, I read a lot of reviews to find out that they run large and narrow so I knew what size to order. They are so comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Norman Sunderman

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Tight at first but after wearing have stretched to a comfortable fit
customer_reviews.author: Lacy Jay

customer_reviews.title: two of them fit great and a third pair seemed to have so much ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 pairs of these... two of them fit great and a third pair seemed to have so much sheep lining inside that it was too small by the time I realized it I had already worn them to work so I couldn't return them but I improvised and used a beard trimmer to cut some of it out. Overall its a great shoe. They look awesome with jeans or sweats.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Not cheap, but they are still the best
customer_reviews.text: I bought the size based on recommendations from UGG store sales staff and friends. They start off feeling a little snug but loosen up after a couple of weeks of use. Now they fit perfectly and I love them! I have tried other "off brands" and imitators. Some are good, some not so, but in the end the UGG brand just always seems to be the best (even with the high prices).
customer_reviews.author: ericbird

customer_reviews.title: Very happy, great seller
customer_reviews.text: Authentic product, rapid shipping. Very happy, great seller. Do not call these Uggs "slippers"! They're awesome around the house on our hardwood floors, but with a grippy rubber sole are just as at home for trips around town. Not great in very wet conditions as the lower part of the shoe is leather and can soak up water.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan N.

customer_reviews.title: Best Slippers EVER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: They're Uggs what more can you say? Super warm and comfy. In my opinion hands down the best slippers on the market. This pair was for my daughter but I have them as well. The first pair I bought lasted about 5 years and I wore them constantly! I'm currently on year two of my second pair and I won't wear anything else because nothing else compares!
customer_reviews.author: J. RB

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Got for my mother, she wears a 7 had to get her a 8 and still to small
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great slippers
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these before and always love them, they last awhile. They start tight and need to be worn to make them the perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: caffeinatedcookies

customer_reviews.title: Great Slippers
customer_reviews.text: Soft but still support my feet. I love the rubber soles.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Totten

customer_reviews.title: Would buy them again
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair for both of my girls and they love them. They fit as expected, however they felt a little snug when first put on until they walked around the house for a little bit. This seemed to loosen them up. The shoes arrive in the original box/ original packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Tina M

customer_reviews.title: SOFT AS A CLOUD
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter for Christmas. Was purr.....lol fect! Will consider purchasing for myself in the near future as I tend to have painful heels on occasion. I don't see these having much impact on the foot while walking as super soft
customer_reviews.author: CAT

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money!!! I wear these every day and even bought my parents a pair for Christmas. I know they are expensive but they are worth every penny. So comfortable...
customer_reviews.author: rita anderson

customer_reviews.title: Super item.
customer_reviews.text: Giving them as a Christmas gift to my Daughter-in-law. I have them and they are great. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Barbara R Arena

customer_reviews.title: Order a size larger!! Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: Order a size larger, these are a size smaller I’ve had to order twice to get the right size. Otherwise a great quality shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves these. Fit is perfect and they look great.
customer_reviews.text: My wife love these and wears them all the time. Fit is just perfect.

customer_reviews.text: They are nice, warm and fit well. On nice days I even wear them shopping with jeans.

customer_reviews.title: Not Original UGG
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality... worst purchase... don't waste your time. We purchase a pair from local store, and there is a HUGE difference in the quality. These are NOT real. Stitching came undone on one of them... just pathetic! Very unhappy, were bought as a gift for my wife.

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfortable moccasins.
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable moccasins and they're so warm. Great for outdoor use as well as indoors. Color and fit were perfect, and the price was great.

customer_reviews.title: Love These!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these Uggs. I have a gray pair and they are not just old house slippers. They seem tight at first, but that is because they are so fluffy. After a little wear, they loosen up a bit. They are just so comfortable and perfect to slip on and go!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry L. Bishop Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Ugg women's moccasin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in my Uggs.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately our weather has warmed up so I have put these away until we experience winter coolness again. I expected these to be snug initially & they are, but I was disappointed in the finishing details of this slipper. And they are made in China. A sticker attached on the bottom stated that & it is mostly man made fabrics, ie polyester fibers inside, not shearing as stated on the website. I should have returned them but if they keep my feet warm & offer some arch support, it will be ok to keep them. But they won’t be reordered when they wear out.

product_meta.title: UGG Women's Dakota Moccasin
product_meta.description: Slipper. How to measure- If you are unsure which shoe size to purchase, please follow the following steps-1.Draw a straight line, longer than your foot, on a piece of paper. 2.Place the paper on a flat surface. Stand on the line with your heel and longest toe centered on the line. If measuring a child's foot, it may be easier to hold the paper up to their foot. 3.Place a mark on the line at the tip of the longest toe and at the back of the heel. 4.Repeat steps 1-3 for the other foot. 5.Measure the distance between the marks. Taking the larger of the two measurements, use the conversion chart to find your correct shoe size. Resistant materials. These run true to size, but will offer some give. If between sizes, we recommend ordering ½ size down.
feature_bullets: Molded rubber outsole. Leather lace with fixed bow
Available in whole sizes only. If between sizes, please order 1/2 size up from your usual size
The lining is made with fiber sewn into a backing and then sewn into the shoe; Made in China.
